db:info.db:title: Component is missing a required property

db:abstract.db:para: [required] A component's required property was not bound.

db:article.db:para: This warning category is spelled [required] by qmllint.

db:section.db:title: Component is missing a required property
What happened?
db:section.db:para: The required property of a component was not set.

db:section.db:title: Why is this bad?
db:section.db:para: QML applications where components miss required properties will misbehave: they will not start at all if a missing required property is detected statically. Dynamically created components with missing required properties will not be created at runtime: they will be null instead.
